Project Four: Post On Message Boards
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: The Monster Rancher Street Team -Join Us!: Projects: Project Four: Post On Message Boards
By Lisa Shock on Thursday, September 9, 2004 - 08:31 pm:

This project is free, and can take up as much time as you are willing to spend.

You simply sign up at gaming message boards and post about MR -recommending that people buy them. The best posts are replies to inquiries about good games. In other words, find a thread about "what game boy game should I play next?" and reply "Monster Rancher Advance 2". Try starting with one or two boards, and once you get the swing of it, start adding boards a few weeks later.

Some tips:
*Be polite! You are representing the MR community, so be aware that if you look like an idiot, people may think the games are idiotic.

*Don't spam! A few carefully placed posts that seem like genuine game talk are a lot better than 30 messages posted in one hour!

*Read the rules of the forum, and follow them! We'd like everyone to be a respected member of online community.

*Be consistant and follow up! Check back at least once a week on your posts, and be ready to answer questions.

Boards to try:

GameFAQs Try the MR specific boards, although people there don't need to be convinced to buy a MR game, as well as the General boards for each console system.

GameSpy Forums

1UP Forums

Electric Playground


Some sites (Gamespot, GameRankings) allow you to vote on games, to give them user scores on how good you think the game is. Make sure to vote for all the MR games!

To suggest a site, please post in the Misc. Q&A thread on this topic!
